# Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun 2

| genre = First-person shooter
| modes = Single-player

Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun 2 is an upcoming first-person shooter video game developed by Auroch Digital and published by Big Fan Games, a label of Devolver Digital. It is set in the Warhammer 40,000 universe and is a direct sequel to Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun. It was announced in May 2025 and is scheduled to release in 2026 for PlayStation 5, Windows and Xbox Series X/S.
Gameplay
Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun 2 is a single-player first-person shooter with similar graphics and gameplay mechanics as the first Boltgun.
Development
Warhammer 40,000: Boltgun 2 was announced on 22 May 2025 by Big Fan Games, and is scheduled to be released in 2026. It will be available on Windows, PlayStation 5, and Xbox Series X and S.
